comments: a(n-1)=sum(P(17;n-1-k,k),k=0..ceiling((n-1)/2)), n>=1, with a(-1)=16. These are the SW-NE diagonals in P(17;n,k), the (17,1) Pascal triangle. Cf. A093645 for the (10,1) Pascal triangle. Observation by _Paul Barry_, Apr 29 2004. Proof via recursion relations and comparison of inputs.
maple: with(numtheory): with(combinat): P:=proc(q) local n;for n from 0 to q do print(17*fibonacci(n)+fibonacci(n-1));od; end: P(30); # _Paolo P. Lava_, May 19 2015
prog: (MAGMA) a0:=1; a1:=17; [GeneralizedFibonacciNumber(a0, a1, n): n in [0..30]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Feb 12 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
